it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common

Interface ColoredObject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AmmoCube, AmmoCubeCost, MessageType, PlayerColor, RoomColor

    public interface ColoredObject
    Provides methods to get color codes of an object with a color. The color can be retrieved either as an ANSI escape code or as an HEX (RGB, 8 bits per channel) value.
    Author:
    Lorenzo Farinelli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAnsiCode()
      Retrieves the ANSI code representing the color of the object
      String getHexCode()
      Retrieves the HEX code representing the color of the object

    • Method Detail

      • getAnsiCode

        String getAnsiCode()
        Retrieves the ANSI code representing the color of the object
        Returns:
        The ANSI code

      • getHexCode

        String getHexCode()
        Retrieves the HEX code representing the color of the object
        Returns:
        The HEX code
